post.body: LOL, so how's it going???
Woo hoo! I made Part II! (Although I do not even remember sending the Onion article!)
@johnpwise @birdspot â€œDid you guys fix the paper jam?" --- PRICELESS --- THE BEST JOKE OF THE YEAR.
Is the book geared to women only?
OK, cool. How are you? Happy New Year.
What the heck are you doing on a bus at this hour? What time is it where you are?!
Nice!
Do u only take peeps who make ur list to Top of the Rock?
Ah, the cute girls' power. Sigh.
Just climb up
Tire shopping is stressful and expensive. My Mazda needs new 'shoes' -- $700 plus. Ugh.
I refuse to buy my way onto the list ;-)
at least you made @johnpwise's list. >Sniff<
non ho detto niente!
LOL! That is fun... My Sundays often involve, Pathmark, Costco, Target etc.
Another note to online daters: Nowhere in your profile should the word "DIVA" appear -- especially not in your screen name.
Note to online daters: Don't post a dozen pix of you with a bunch of other people -- especially if they are hotter than you.
Apparently I've won some kind of award with the NYPD Auxiliary Police. How about that.
Question: How is the "SNUGGIE" any different from a really big sweater? http://tinyurl.com/4aqsmv
How annoying is laundry?
